boardgame.name: A Game of Thrones Collectible Card Game
Trónok harca gyűjthető kártyajáték
boardgame.description: This entry is for the Collectible Card Game (CCG) that pre-dated the current Living Card Game (LCG). For the LCG, go to A Game of Thrones: The Card Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Collectible Card Game based on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A Song of Ice and Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; series of fantasy novels by George R. R. Martin._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The following Starters and Booster Packs were released before the transition to LCG Format:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Westeros_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Sea of Storms_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Flight of Dragons_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ice and Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Throne of Blades_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Crown of Suns_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Valyrian_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Tourney of Swords_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Reign of Kings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Winter Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Song of Twilight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A Song of Night_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Iron Throne_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A House of Thorns_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A House of Talons_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Five Kings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Game of Thrones: The Card Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Valyrian Edition starter set. 110 cards w/ protectors

*** PRIVATE SALE RESERVED FOR BGG USER _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;TRUMP_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; *** Per negotiation via GeekMail. Lot of 350+ cards, 5 unopened boosters, 14 game mats/inventory lists, and empty 4 boxes/13 wrappers for Gold Program.

This sale is for two sealed boxes of Winter Edition Premium Starter Set which contains 10 starter packs each. Picture of the box, showing condition, is available. Contact me for further questions about shipping and payment. NOTE: This item is already tagged by the user odennsonn. If any other use tries to purchase this item, the sale is void.

For sale: the contents of an opened and sorted booster box from the very first set. This amounts to about 600 cards and two starter decks for Lannister and Barratheon. Great condition and unplayed. PayPal only, Shipping £6 UK, £9 Europe.
I have four decks of Game of Thrones, Ice and Fire Edition. Houses of Lannister, Greyjoy, Baratheon and Stark. New in shrink.

This is a composite item consisting of the games won by user Nich in my recent Geekbay auction; that is the only person who may purchase it. Contents: A Game of Thrones CCG, Sim City Card Game. Approximate weight _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; size (not counting the shipping box): 1 lb. 10 oz; 6_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 2.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Paypal preferred, but other means OK; all money must clear before items are shipped.
Set of cards to a specified buyer. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H is free.
Sold to Jonas Mierek (evil_rabbit) As per email purchase. Cost $5.

This is for my 2000 card lot for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Brother Narsis_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in my auction. I believe this will all fit in a medium or large flat rate box, but if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like cheaper shipping, let me know and I will check the media mail price.
For auction winner; with priority shipping.

All the cards I have (almost 1500), comprised of the following. Full Booster boxes (36 packs each) 1 x Iron Throne 1 x House of Thorns 1 x House of Talons Ice and Fire starter packs (~60 cards each) 1 x Baratheon 1 x Greyjoy 1 x Lannister 1 x Stark 1 x Targaryen All of these have been opened. I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t traded or sold off anything, so you get the normal distribution of rares, uncommons, and commons from those packs. If you have questions about any particular cards, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d be happy to look if I have it, but I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have a full itemized inventory. I bought these these to do a sealed tournament with my friends that we didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t finish. Many of the cards were never played with, and we used cases for the rest.
This is for David Cuesta. Sale is for a complete set of Reign of Kings expansion, in promotional binder and a complete set of House of Thorns expansion in regular binder.
For Scott Awesome (Keggy) Shipping: Flat Rate Priority Mail - $11
